about_the_game:
Space Warrior: Dark Warrior of Space

Space Warrior invites you to a dangerous and exciting space adventure in which you fight against hordes of hostile aliens. In this fast paced 2D survival game, you will have to use your skills and strategy to survive and save the galaxy.

Deep in space, ruthless aliens have invaded your galaxy. You, as a chosen space warrior, are the last hope to stand up to these invading forces and protect your home. Equipped with a variety of weapons and upgrades, you will launch into space to defeat waves of enemies and uncover the dark secrets of space.

Each level presents unique challenges and obstacles. You must avoid asteroid fields, hide from enemy ships and face relentless alien creatures. Along the way, collect power-ups and bonuses that will help you survive and succeed in your mission. Become the dark warrior of space and determine the fate of the galaxy.

name: Space Warrior

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Use your skills and strategy to save your galaxy in Space Warrior, a fast-paced 2D survival game where you fight with alien invaders. Each level presents unique challenges and you need to defeat waves of enemies to survive.
